main event: Mr. and Mrs. E. Crum observed a large, bright reddish-orange circular object hovering in the sky in Colorado Springs on March 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball at arm's length, The Crums reported the sighting to the Colorado Springs Police Department immediately after, The object began to move slowly before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight, Air Force personnel were notified and investigated but found no explanation for the sighting, Mr. Charles Keeney also reported seeing a metallic circular object hovering in the sky around the same date.
